Script: plot_schedule¶

This script can be used to plot the Apertif imaging schedule for a given observing run.

Reference¶

This script visualises the observing schedule by producing elevation and HA plots as a function of time. Written in python3 and using pandas, astropy and matplotlib.

Parameter
obs_id : str
csv file with the schedule.
Example:
python plot_schedule.py schedule.csv
